message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and avoids any potential conflict.
I'll give you a small portion, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills
I propose we divide the money based on our contributions. Since you've shown a willingness to negotiate aggressively, I believe this balance reflects our respective positions.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I've been too generous so far. You're getting a better deal than I expected.
